text: Pomogayte lyudyam izbezhat' prelyubodeyaniya i vsego vedushchego k etoy merzosti. Poetomu soyedinyayte brakom nezhenatykh muzhchin i nezamuzhnikh zhenshchin i pravednykh iz vashikh rabov i rabyn'. Pust' nedostatok ne budet prichinoy, prepyatstvuyushchey braku. Poistine, Allakh daruyet nadel dlya khoroshey zhizni tem, kto zhelayet khranit' svoyo tselomudriye. Shchedrost' Allakha velika, i ne otyagotit Yego obogashcheniye lyudey. Ved' On znayet namereniya lyudey, i Yego znaniye ob"yemlet vsyakuyu veshch' vo Vselennoy
